channel.title: Dictum mortuum's handbooks
channel.description: Recent content on Dictum mortuum's handbooks

item.description: credits Below is a list of resources that I used during the creation of this guide. They might contain opinions different than my own, but you could use them in order to get another point of view for your character. a guide to the dungeons and dragons 5th edition paladdin through the eyes of a 3rd edition player by T.G. Oskar good is not nice by EvilAnagram dnd 5e - the paladin handbook by RPG BOT my word is my sword
